metadata.title: RZ/V2M: I wish to use a sensor other than one selected by Renesas.

sections.content:
Question:
What should I do if I wish to use a sensor other than one selected by Renesas?
Answer:
As a general rule, you should use a sensor selected by Renesas. 
Please contact us because we are considering gradually expanding sensor support. 
We also plan to offer a paid service for providing sensor support via a partner in the future.
Suitable Products
RZ/V2M
